title: Capturing electronic patient reported outcomes in oncology practice. - ASCO Publications

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% of patients completed assessments, reducing discontinuation risk by 30%.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate AI-driven prompts to optimize timing and format for higher engagement.

**CONCERN**: Limited validation studies raise questions about cross-platform clinical validity.
